[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@yext/search-core](./search-core.md) &gt; [ClientSDKHeaderValues](./search-core.clientsdkheadervalues.md) &gt; [ANSWERS\_CORE](./search-core.clientsdkheadervalues.answers_core.md)

## ClientSDKHeaderValues.ANSWERS\_CORE property

The ANSWERS\_CORE agent should not be supplied. Instead, it will be automatically added to the header and populated with the version of Search Core being used.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ANSWERS_CORE?: never;
```
